About Me

N

Niranjan Agaram

Lead Data Engineer by day, AI innovator by passion. I bridge the gap between solid data engineering foundations and cutting-edge AI solutions, helping businesses build intelligent systems that actually work in production.

Currently specializing in freelance AI development - from RAG systems to agentic AI workflows, always built on robust data infrastructure.
